Sarasota.Sarasota County Courthouse: The Sarasota County Courthouse is a historic courthouse building located at 2000 Main Street in Sarasota, Florida. Designed by architect Dwight James Baum in the Mediterranean Revival style, it was built in 1926-1927 by Stevenson and Cameron, Inc. On March 22, 1984, it was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places.
